name: Chinese Checkers LTE
description:
Chinese checkers (variant of Halma) is a classic board game that can be played by two to six people!

The aim is to race all of one's pieces into the star corner on the opposite side of the before the opponents do the same. The destination corner is called home.

Each player starts with their colored pieces on one of the six points or corners of the star and attempt to race them all home into the opposite corner. Players take turns moving a single piece, either by moving one step in any direction to an adjacent empty space, or by jumping in one or any number of available consecutive hops over other single pieces. A player may not combine hopping with a single-step move.
